question: Which is the world's smallest bird?
explanation: Bee Hummingbird is the smallest bird in the world. It is only 2 to 2.4 inches long and weighs 0.056 to 0.071 ounces. This bird is also known as zunzuncito or Helena Hummingbird. This bird is native to Cuba. It is endemic to the entire Cuban archipelago. It is "Nearly Threatened" bird species according to IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
